homePageText.title: Azure Arc Appliance Diagnostics
homePageText.description: Use Azure Arc Appliance Diagnostics to investigate the status of your Appliance. Select the problem category that best matches the information or tool that you're interested in:

categories.name: Alerts
categories.description: View and gain information on alerts emitted by your Appliance.

categories.name: Appliance Extension Insights
categories.description: View status and investigate issues related to extensions installed on your Appliance.

categories.name: Appliance Insights
categories.description: View status and investigate issues related to core functionality of your Appliance. Diagnose connectivity status and see recommended actions.
